Variables

SUBREDDIT = 'politics'

Imports

{% raw %}

Run query

Lexeme-based

{% raw %}

query_lexeme[source]

query_lexeme(lex, year)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
gen = query_lexeme('Anglo-Saxon', 2006)
next(gen)
{% endraw %}

Subreddit-based

{% raw %}

query_subr[source]

query_subr(subreddit)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

query_subr_year[source]

query_subr_year(subreddit, year)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Collect results

{% raw %}

get_results[source]

get_results(gen, limit)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
results = get_results(query_gen, 100)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert len(results) == 100
{% endraw %}

Convert to DF

{% raw %}

conv_results_to_df[source]

conv_results_to_df(results)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
comments = conv_results_to_df(results)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert comments.shape == (100, 23)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
comments['body']
{% endraw %}

Write out comments

{% raw %}

comm_subr_to_csv[source]

comm_subr_to_csv(comments, subreddit='NaN', limit='NaN', year='NaN')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
comm_subr_to_csv(comments, 'politics', 100, '2007')
{% endraw %}

Pipeline function

{% raw %}

get_subr_year[source]

get_subr_year(subreddit, year, limit)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
